1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Charlotte and Simon meet unexpectedly and realize that they have a lot in common, including that they attend the same school. Simon takes Charlotte to his parent's mansion and introduces her to his family. She is thrilled to find out that Simon's father is a long time friend of her father's.

imdb.plot outline: "Because We're Thespians" is a dramatic comedy series, revolving around the lives of two high-school-age friends, Charlotte Rose Singer and Simon Carter, who both desire to excel in their professions as thespians. Charlotte Rose Singer's modest background as a bakery-worker during after-school hours is the complete opposite of Simon Carter's lavish lifestyle that includes his own driver and a live-in maid. Despite their different upbringing, the duo becomes the best of friends and Simon eventually helps Charlotte become more confident in her acting and singing abilities as she evolves from her shell. Together the pair end up taking on challenges that include trying to convince Simon's musical-producer parents that he and Charlotte are talented enough to be a part of their hit Broadway production.
imdb.title: Because We're Thespians
plot: "_Because We're Thespians_ (qv)" is a dramatic comedy series, revolving around the lives of two high-school-age friends, Charlotte Rose Singer and Simon Carter, who both desire to excel in their professions as thespians. Charlotte Rose Singer's modest background as a bakery-worker during after-school hours is the complete opposite of Simon Carter's lavish lifestyle that includes his own driver and a live-in maid. Despite their different upbringing, the duo becomes the best of friends and Simon eventually helps Charlotte become more confident in her acting and singing abilities as she evolves from her shell. Together the pair end up taking on challenges that include trying to convince Simon's musical-producer parents that he and Charlotte are talented enough to be a part of their hit Broadway production.::JohnRoland Prejean
